module.name: rpc
module.summary: Remote Procedure Call Daemon for managment of network based process communication

interface.name: rpc_stub
interface.summary: RPC stub interface. No access allowed.

template.name: rpc_domain_template
template.summary: The template to define a rpc domain.

desc.p: This template creates a domain to be used for a new rpc daemon.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The type of daemon to be used.

interface.name: rpc_udp_send
interface.summary: Send UDP network traffic to rpc and recieve UDP traffic from rpc. (Deprecated)

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpc_dontaudit_getattr_exports
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of the NFS export file.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: rpc_manage_nfs_rw_content
interface.summary: Allow domain to create read and write NFS directories.

interface.name: rpc_manage_nfs_ro_content
interface.summary: Allow domain to create read and write NFS directories.

interface.name: rpc_udp_rw_nfs_sockets
interface.summary: Allow domain to read and write to an NFS UDP socket.

desc.p: Allow gssd to read temp directory.
Allow nfs servers to modify public files used for public file transfer services.
